findings.description: Legacy router module was not referenced anywhere in the codebase, leaving an unused export path that risks drift and confusion.
findings.resolution: Removed the unused router module to prevent dead code from diverging from active routing logic.

findings.description: ESM Jest test used global module mocks that leaked across suites, breaking other OpenAI tests when additional exports were requested.
findings.resolution: Refactored the test to isolate module mocking per test run and provide explicit stubs for required exports, eliminating cross-suite interference.
